properties.areaDesc: Pope, IL; Hardin, IL; Crittenden, KY; Livingston, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 9:13AM CST until February 25 at 11:15AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Kentucky...Illinois...

Ohio River at Owensboro...Newburgh Dam...Evansville...Mount Vernon
...J.T. Myers Dam...Shawneetown and Golconda

.With the exception of the Ohio River at Shawneetown, all river points
from Owensboro to Golconda has cresting or falling water levels.
Shawneetown will fall to minor flood stage on Sunday. Most locations
will fall below flood stage between this Friday through next Tuesday.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at Golconda.
* until Tuesday morning.
* At  8:00 AM Thursday the stage was 47.2 feet.
* Flood Stage is 40.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is cresting at this time. The river
will fall below flood stage Tuesday morning.
* Impact...At 46.0 Feet...Flooding begins to affect Rosiclare
Illinois.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
